sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,MCC_CATEGORY_ID ,PROFIT_TYPE ,MER_RATE_1 ,MER_RATE_2 ,MER_HIGHEST_FEE ,MER_LOWEST_FEE ,STATUS ,RESERVED FROM MER_TRACT_TYPE_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND MER_TRACT_TYPE_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MCC_CATEGORY_ID) =#mcc_category_id#
(PROFIT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#profit_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_TRACT_TYPE_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND MER_TRACT_TYPE_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(MCC_CATEGORY_ID) =#mcc_category_id#
(PROFIT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#profit_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
